summary: Completed testing of Bulk Evaluation feature. All backend APIs and frontend UI working correctly. CSV template download, file upload, batch evaluation, and results display all functioning properly.
passed_tests: GET /api/underwriting/csv-template - returns valid CSV template with correct headers
CSV template download has correct Content-Type and Content-Disposition headers
Validation: Non-CSV files rejected with 400 error
Validation: Empty CSV (headers only) rejected appropriately
Smoker proposals correctly show premium loading
Dashboard, Rules, Stages, Risk Bands, Products pages all load correctly
Download Template button triggers CSV download
Evaluate button properly disabled when no file selected
Evaluate button enabled after file selection
Results summary cards (Total, Passed, Failed, Pass Rate, Time) display correctly
Results table shows proposal details (ID, STP Decision, Case Type, Premiums, Loading, Triggered Rules)
Export CSV button visible and functional
Navigation sidebar includes Bulk Evaluation link with correct icon
seed_data_creation: Test CSV file at /tmp/test_proposals.csv used for evaluation testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Bulk Evaluation feature fully tested and working. Test file for CSV evaluation is at /tmp/test_proposals.csv. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_bulk_evaluation.py cover CSV template, evaluation, validation, and existing endpoints.
